p: Documents identified through this search were screened for reference to PSE data. The full text of relevant documents were then reviewed by a single reviewer to determine if any of the PSE found in the Phase 1 review were referenced in the context of research utilization and stakeholder engagement, each identified through a set of indicators. The development of these indicators were informed by research utilization and stakeholder engagement implementation guidelines by Population Council [ 25]. The indicators, corresponding types of sources assessed, and examples of language reflecting each form of utilization are outlined in Table 1.
